alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 19 at 2:25AM EST until January 21 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Clay and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
